idea-plugin.name: Markmap Preview
idea-plugin.description:
Transform your Markdown documents into interactive mind maps!

Markmap Preview brings the power of visual thinking to your Markdown workflow. See your document structure as a beautiful, interactive mind map that updates in real-time as you type.

✨ Key Features

  • 🧠 Interactive Mind Map Visualization - Transform Markdown structure into beautiful mind maps
  • 🎨 Theme Integration - Automatically follows your IDE's light/dark theme
  • ⚡ Real-time Updates - See changes instantly as you type
  • 🔍 Zoom & Pan Controls - Navigate large mind maps with ease
  • 📱 Flexible View Modes - Editor only, Split view, or Preview only
  • 🎯 Center & Fit - Quickly navigate and focus your mind map
  • 🖱️ Interactive Nodes - Click to expand/collapse branches

🚀 How to Use

  1. Open any Markdown (.md) file
  2. Use the toolbar buttons to switch between view modes
  3. Your Markdown headings become mind map nodes automatically
  4. Use zoom controls for better navigation
  5. Click nodes to expand/collapse sections

💡 Perfect For

  • Documentation writers and technical authors
  • Students organizing study notes
  • Project managers planning and structuring content
  • Anyone who thinks visually!

Powered by the excellent Markmap library for beautiful, interactive mind maps.
